name: Flee: Don't Hit The Walls
description:
Flee is a simple puzzle platformer game with 2d abstract graphics. Every level your main goal is have to drag cute yellow robot to the door and rescue from Planet of Circles.

It's seems look easy but not much because walls are dangerous! If you touch the walls game over. You have to dont hit the walls.


Every level maze getting harder complate and as you progress you will move to different planets. Every planet has different maze type to tackle in. For example in second planet door is locked. First you have to find the buttons in the maze and go over them and remove the lock on the door, then you can exit through the opened door.

In the game timing is also important. If you want to success with a full of stars you have to be move quickly. You can challange complate every level for 3 stars.
